DOC.brief_summary: The COBIS II registry multi-center , real-world registry drug-eluting stenting coronary bifurcation lesion South Korea . From 18 major coronary intervention center Korea , total 2,873 patient enrolled database January 2003 December 2009 . The aim study investigate long-term clinical result predictor adverse outcomes percutaneous coronary intervention drug-eluting stent coronary bifurcation lesion South Korea .
DOC.brief_title: Korean Coronary Bifurcation Stenting ( COBIS ) Registry II
DOC.criteria: Age > = 18 year Any type bifurcation lesion major epicardial artery Side branch reference diameter > = 2.3 mm least stentable 2.5 mm stent Treated drugeluting stent Protected leave main disease previous CABG LAD LCX territory Cardiogenic Shock History CPR hospitalization
